column4: hmm...I'm trying to play a DVD (making sure everything is set before I give this computer to my sister)...mplayer is telling me it can't open DVD device /dev/dvd...how do I tell whether this is a hardware or a software problem?
there is no /dev/dvd link by default. either make one, or change it to /dev/cdrom
yeah, just change it to /dev/cdrom , it should work
